/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, hinting at the city's organized chaos. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of industrial charm to the scene. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the street, connecting different parts of the city. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and roads.
